heading: Restrictions on use of license
text:
No holder of a license issued under this chapter shall authorize, consent to or permit the
use of his or her license by or on behalf of any other person, and no person who has not qualified and obtained or renewed a license
under this chapter shall hold himself or herself out to the public as licensed, certified, registered or as the holder of a license issued
under this chapter, either directly or indirectly, by means of signs, sign cards, plates, stationery, or in any other manner whatsoever.
